content.title: Email Content
content.visibleText: Hey Clare, Firat here, PM of Jive, and I want to hear your thoughts about CoPilot. Firat Gomi | Product Manager john.smith@ignitetech.com Learn more at ignitetech.com/jive

content.title: Email Draft
content.visibleText: Hey Candice, Firat here, I wanted to send this email personally because I saw that the Critical User Hub CoPilot on Sandbox only gave medium activity. I wanted to know if there are any reasons for not enabling it more often since it's free? I've seen that your users have used it 13 times during the 30-day demo launch. This shows interest in AI for your company, and we'd love to be a part of it. You can also just shoot me your thoughts as a reply to this email. You can be as candid as possible, no need to hold back on your feedback. Be cautious about sharing sensitive information. candice.henderson@supercommunications.com is outside your organization and isn't in your contacts. Regards, Firat

windows.title: Hey Clare, Firat here, PM of Jive, and I want to hear your thoughts about CoPilot - firat.gomi@trilogy.com - DevFactory Mail - Pinned - High memory usage - 1.1 GB - Google Chrome - Firat (trilogy.com)

uiElements.details: interface with tabs, search bar, side menu, compose button, and settings icon

content.title: Email Content
content.visibleText:
Hey Clare, Firat here, PM of Jive, and I want to hear your thoughts about CoPilot

Firat Gomi | Product Manager
firat.gomi@ignitetech.com

Hey Clare,

I hope you are well.

I wanted to send this email personally because I saw that the Central Unit had CoPilot on standby mode since last week.

I've seen that your users have used it 135 times during the 30-day demo launch. This shows interest and I would like to hear your thoughts about Jive and CoPilot since you are a valuable customer for us.

You can also just shoot me your thoughts as a reply to this email. You can be as candid as possible.

If you haven't been aware of CoPilot yet, you can check this list of tutorials to learn more about it and how to enable it in the Jive system.

Besides these, let me know if I can help you in any way or if I've failed to create a connection here.

Best regards,

Firat Gomi | Product Manager

Learn more at ignitetech.com/onthenrise
